item.title: Best Winter Skincare Routine | Natural Organic Skincare & K Beauty
item.author: edibleclinic@gmail.com (The Edible Clinic)
item.description: The exact skincare products you choose for the winter time will depend on the climate you live in, your skin type and age. In Sydney for example, winter is very mild compared with the northern hemisphere, and things don’t get that dry. In general though, you would be looking for skincare that is more nourishing and richer compared with your summertime routine.

item.title: Difference Between Lotions and Cream | Dry vs Dehydrated Skin | Humectants Emollients Occlusives | Natural Organic Skincare & K Beauty
item.author: edibleclinic@gmail.com (The Edible Clinic)
item.description: Dry skin vs dehydrated skin. What are the differences between humectants, emollients, lotions, creams and occlusives? Humectants are substances that bind to water. An emollient is a moisturizer that smoothes the skin, helping to give it a creamier texture. Dehydrated skin is lacking in water, whereas dry skin is lacking in oil. This is why oily skin can be dehydrated at the same time. If your skin feels “dry” but is feels well moisturized after using humectants alone, then likely you have dehydrated skin. Whereas if using humectants alone isn’t enough, and you need emollients or even occlusives, then you have dry skin.

item.title: What is Glass Skin | How To Get Korean Glass Skin | Glass Skin Routine | Organic Natural Skincare
item.author: edibleclinic@gmail.com (The Edible Clinic)
item.description: This K-beauty trend makes it easy to get glass skin & dewy glowy skin. It’s about using multiple layers of hydrating but lightweight skincare on your face. This will give your skin a luminous, transparent glow - but unlike using makeup to achieve this effect, you’ve pulled it off using ingredients that actually nourish your skin, both in the short and long term.

item.title: What Is Hyperpigmentation On The Face? How To Fade Pigmentation, Acne Scars & Age Spots With Natural Skincare Products, Safe Organic Skincare & K Beauty
item.author: edibleclinic@gmail.com (The Edible Clinic)
item.description: We cover causes for hyperpigmentation, how to treat hyperpigmentation, and our routine for fading blemishes, without using medicated treatments. It works for flat acne scars, post inflammatory hyperpigmentation & freckles. Remember to be consistent with this routine for 6 months to a year in order to see results.
